Mitigation Notes: Known at planning time; safe as a structural ID.
Known at planning time; safe as a structural ID.
Defined in artistic planning; does not depend on realised sales.
Known in advance; safe.
Capacity known once venue is booked; safe.
Schedule defined pre-forecast; safe.
Historical sales from prior seasons as lagged features; never from the forecast season.
Historical sales from prior seasons as lagged features; never from the forecast season.
Aggregated historical single tickets; safe as lagged features.
Derived historical total tickets; safe as lagged features.
Construct using only seasons prior to the forecast season.
Requires future sales trajectory; exclude from initial forecasting models.
Outcome-like feature; only use for ex-post analysis or in-run models.
Based on post hoc allocations; avoid for pre-run forecasts.
Depends on realised behaviour; leakage if used in training as a feature.
If budget is fixed pre-forecast, use planned amount as scenario input.
Do not feed actual spend that is decided after forecast time into training features.
Only known post-campaign; safe only for back-testing analyses.
Historical aggregate stats can be used as input features.
Can be used for in-run forecasting but not for pre-on-sale forecasts.
Use values available at or before forecast date; avoid future macro revisions.
Future weather unknown; use only in scenario testing or back-tests.
Use only restrictions known or announced at the time of forecasting.
If forecasting very early, exclude; if forecasting close to on-sale, may include recent trends.
Event attendance data is available from PredictHQ before run dates; safe for pre-run forecasting.
Sports event attendance predictions available before run dates; safe for forecasting.
Concert attendance predictions available before run dates; safe for forecasting.
Count of scheduled events is known before run dates; safe.
Predicted spend from PredictHQ is available before run dates; safe for forecasting.
Event rank is pre-assigned by PredictHQ; known before events occur; safe.
Average rank computed from scheduled events; safe.
Holiday dates are fixed and known in advance; safe.
Severe weather is unpredictable; use only in scenario planning or in-run models.
Composite score derived from known PredictHQ features; safe if inputs are safe.
